root.name: Dinosaur Safari
root.description: Overview The game takes place at the National Chronographic Society where you've been assigned to use a device called the Kronos Sphere to go back in time to the Mesozoic Era and take pictures of any dinosaurs you see in 310 different locations. With every dinosaur you capture on camera you'll fill up data crystals that count as payment towards more tools like a radar or video camera. The team who worked on the game consisted of scientists and designers from the Oregon Museum of Science and Industry.
